info.name: CRM Healthcare API
info.description: API collection untuk CRM Healthcare/Pharmaceutical Platform - Sales CRM

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Login dengan email dan password. Response akan menyertakan JWT token dan refresh token.

response.name: Success Response
Error Response - Invalid Credentials

request.description: Mobile login dengan email dan password. Hanya user dengan role yang memiliki mobile_access enabled yang dapat login melalui endpoint ini. Response akan menyertakan JWT token dan refresh token.

response.name: Success Response
Error Response - Invalid Credentials
Error Response - Role Not Allowed

request.description: Refresh access token menggunakan refresh token.
Logout user dan invalidate token.

item.description: Endpoints untuk authentication dan authorization

item.name: Web
Master Data
User Management

request.description: Get list of users with pagination
Get user details by ID
Create a new user
Update user information
Delete a user
Get user permissions in hierarchical menu structure
Get complete user profile with stats, activities, transactions, and connections

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Update user profile information (name only)
Change user password. Requires current password verification.
Get list of all roles
Get role details by ID
Create a new role
Update role information
Delete a role
Assign permissions to a role
Get list of all permissions
Get permission details by ID

item.description: User Management endpoints untuk mengelola users, roles, dan permissions

item.name: Account Management

request.description: Get list of accounts with pagination
Get account details by ID
Create a new account
Update account information
Delete an account

item.description: Account Management endpoints untuk mengelola accounts (Hospitals, Clinics, Pharmacies)

item.name: Categories

request.description: Get list of all categories
Get category details by ID
Create a new category
Update category information
Delete a category

item.description: Category Management endpoints untuk mengelola account categories (Hospital, Clinic, Pharmacy)

item.name: Contact Roles

request.description: Get list of all contact roles
Get contact role details by ID
Create a new contact role
Update contact role information
Delete a contact role

item.description: Contact Role Management endpoints untuk mengelola contact roles (Doctor, PIC, Manager, Other)

website, referral, cold_call, event, social_media, email_campaign, partner, other

  "create_contact": true,
  "account_id": null,
  "contact_id": null
}

request.description: Convert a qualified lead to an opportunity (deal). Lead must be in 'qualified' status to be converted. Required fields: opportunity_title, stage_id. Optional: create_account (auto-create account from lead), create_contact (auto-create contact from lead), account_id (use existing account), contact_id (use existing contact). Value is in smallest currency unit (sen). Probability is 0-100 percentage. Upon conversion, lead status changes to 'converted', and all associated visit reports and activities are automatically migrated to the created account/deal.

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
  "opportunity_title": "New Deal from Lead - PT Healthcare Indonesia",

  "stage_id": "pipeline_stage_id_here",

  "probability": 50,
  "expected_close_date": "2024-12-31T00:00:00+07:00",

response.name: Error Response - Lead Already Converted

request.description: Create an account from a lead (pre-convert, before lead conversion). The lead's company_name will be used for the account name. Optionally create a contact person from the lead's details (first_name, last_name, email, phone, job_title). Requires lead_id and lead must not already have an account (account_id must be null). category_id is optional, if not provided, the first available category will be used. This is useful for creating accounts during the qualification phase before converting the lead to a deal.

item.description: Pipeline Stages endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages. Note: 'Lead' stage has been removed. Deals enter the pipeline starting from 'Qualification' stage after lead conversion. Standard stages: Qualification, Proposal, Negotiation, Closed Won, Closed Lost.

request.description: Get deal details by ID

Create a new deal. Note: In the CRM flow, deals should typically be created via Lead Conversion (POST /leads/:id/convert) rather than directly. This endpoint is available for edge cases. Required fields: title, account_id, stage_id. Value is in smallest currency unit (sen). Probability is 0-100 percentage. lead_id is optional and can be used to link a deal to its source lead.

request.description: Update deal information. All fields are optional.

Sales Pipeline Management endpoints untuk mengelola pipeline stages dan deals

item.name: Visit Reports

request.description: Get list of visit reports with pagination. Filter by deal_id to get visit reports for a specific deal. Filter by lead_id to get visit reports for a specific lead (during qualification phase). Filter by account_id to get visit reports for a specific account.
Get visit report details by ID

body.raw:
{
  "account_id": "account_id_here",
  "contact_id": "contact_id_here",
  "deal_id": "deal_id_here",
  "lead_id": "lead_id_here",
  "visit_date": "2024-01-15 09:00",
  "purpose": "Sales visit to discuss new products",
  "notes": "Meeting went well, discussed pricing"
}

request.description: Create a new visit report. Business rules: Either lead_id OR account_id is required. If deal_id is provided, account_id must also be provided (deals require accounts). account_id is optional when lead_id is provided (for pre-conversion visits during qualification phase). visit_date format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm (e.g., '2024-01-15 09:00').

Update visit report information. Business rules: Either lead_id OR account_id is required. If deal_id is provided, account_id must also be provided (deals require accounts). visit_date format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm (e.g., '2024-01-15 09:00'). Status can only be updated to 'draft' or 'submitted'.
Delete a visit report
Check in to a visit report with GPS location
Check out from a visit report with GPS location
Approve a visit report (supervisor action)
Reject a visit report with reason (supervisor action)
Upload a photo to a visit report

item.description: Visit Report Management endpoints untuk mengelola visit reports dengan check-in/out, GPS, dan dokumentasi foto

item.name: Activities

request.description: Get list of activities with pagination. Filter by deal_id to get activities for a specific deal. Filter by lead_id to get activities for a specific lead (during qualification phase). Filter by account_id to get activities for a specific account. Business rule: Activity must be linked to at least one of: lead_id, account_id, or deal_id.
Get activity details by ID
Create a new activity. Business rule: Activity must be linked to at least one of: lead_id, account_id, or deal_id.

Get activity timeline for account/contact/deal/lead/user. Filter by deal_id to get timeline for a specific deal. Filter by lead_id to get timeline for a specific lead (during qualification phase). Filter by account_id to get timeline for a specific account. At least one filter (account_id, contact_id, deal_id, lead_id, or user_id) is required.

item.description: Activity Tracking endpoints untuk mengelola activities dan timeline
